sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'
import { Col } from 'react-grid-system'
import MovieDetails from './MovieDetails'
import { useHistory, Route, Link, Switch, Router } from "react-router-dom";

const IMG_BASE_URL = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500"

function Movie(props) {
    const history = useHistory();

    const learnMoreMovie = () => {
        history.push('/details')
    }

    return (
        <>
        <Col style={{margin: '20px 0'}}>
            <Card className="card">
                <Card.Img style={{width: '100%'}} variant="top" src={IMG_BASE_URL + props.movie.poster_path} />
                <Card.Body className="container">
                    <Card.Title className="title">{props.movie.original_title}</Card.Title>
                    <Card.Text className="description">
                    {props.movie.overview}
                    </Card.Text>
                    <Router>
                        <Switch>
                            <Route path="/details" render={(props) => (
                                <MovieDetails {...props} isAuthed={true} />
                            )}/>
                        </Switch>
                    </Router>
                    <Link to="/details">
                        <Button variant="primary" onClick={() => {learnMoreMovie()}}>Learn more</Button>
                    </Link>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </Col>
        </>
    )
}

export default Movie
